prismflow.enable.description: Enable or disable the PrismFlow extension.

prismflow.highlightColors.description: Colors used for block highlighting. Add or remove RGBA/HEX color strings.

prismflow.highlightOpacity.description: Opacity for the highlight background colors (0 = transparent, 1 = opaque).

prismflow.labelBackgroundColor.description: Background color for the block labels (e.g., -- Object (Depth: X)).

prismflow.showBlockLabels.description: Show labels (e.g., -- Object (Depth: X)) at the end of highlighted blocks.

prismflow.labelFormat.description: Format string for block labels. Use {name} for block name, {depth} for nesting depth, {lines} for line count, and {chars} for character count.

prismflow.activeHighlightStyle.description: Custom CSS style for the active block highlight (e.g., { 'border': '1px solid red' }).

prismflow.showOverviewRuler.description: Show colored markers in the scrollbar's overview ruler indicating block depth.

prismflow.errorHighlightStyle.description: Custom CSS style for highlighting unmatched/malformed braces (e.g., { 'border': '1px solid red' }).

prismflow.showDepthInStatusBar.description: Show the current block's nesting depth in the VS Code status bar.

prismflow.statusBarPriority.description: Sets the priority of the PrismFlow depth indicator in the status bar. Higher numbers move it further to the left.

prismflow.rootPathName.description: The name used for the root (top-level) block in the generated path. Common values are '$' (JSONPath) or 'root'.

prismflow.supportedLanguages.description: List of language IDs (e.g., 'json', 'javascript') where PrismFlow should be active.
